item.title: Basic Syntax in Markdown
item.description: Heading There are 6 level hierarchy of heading that you can use in Markdown. To create heading, add hashtag symbols # before you write the headers. The amount of # you add will respond the 1-6 typeface size of your heading level hierarchy. Heading level hierarchy Markdown syntax Example Level 1 Title page # Heading level 1 Level 2 Main topic ## Heading level 2 Level 3 Sub topic ### Heading level 3 Rendered output example:
